steps: apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y libgomp1 wget build-essential libc6-dev

deploy.startCommand: export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && gunicorn VisAutoML.wsgi
